00014 require_once('html_parse.inc.php');
00015 require_once('modules.inc.php');
00016 // module glue gets loaded on demand

00019 // module_image.inc.php has more information on what's going on inside modules

00023 function iframe_alter_save($args)
00024 {
00025         $elem = $args['elem'];
00026         $obj = &$args['obj'];
00027         if (!elem_has_class($elem, 'iframe')) {
00028                 return false;
00029         }
00030         
00031         // parse children elements to find iframe
00032         $childs = html_parse(elem_val($elem));
00033         $i = false;
00034         foreach ($childs as $c) {
00035                 if (elem_tag($c) == 'iframe') {
00036                         $i = $c;
00037                         break;
00038                 }
00039         }
00040         if (!$i) {
00041                 log_msg('warn', 'iframe_alter_save: no iframe element found, inner html is '.var_dump_inl($childs));
00042                 return false;
00043         }
00044         
00045         // url
00046         if (elem_attr($i, 'src') !== NULL) {
00047                 $obj['iframe-url'] = elem_attr($i, 'src');
00048         } else {
00049                 unset($obj['iframe-url']);
00050         }
00051         // scrolling
00052         if (elem_css($i, 'overflow') == 'hidden' || (elem_css($i, 'overflow-x') == 'hidden' && elem_css($i, 'overflow-y') == 'hidden')) {
00053                 unset($obj['iframe-scroll']);
00054         } else {
00055                 $obj['iframe-scroll'] = 'scroll';
00056         }
00057         
00058         return true;
00059 }
00060 
00061 
00062 function iframe_alter_render_early($args)
00063 {
00064         $elem = &$args['elem'];
00065         $obj = $args['obj'];
00066         if (!elem_has_class($elem, 'iframe')) {
00067                 return false;
00068         }
00069         
00070         // add iframe
00071         $i = elem('iframe');
00072         // frameborder is not valid html5
00073         //if (!$args['edit'] && IE8_COMPAT) {
00074         //      elem_attr($i, 'frameborder', '0');
00075         //}
00076         elem_css($i, 'background-color', 'transparent');
00077         elem_css($i, 'border-width', '0px');
00078         elem_css($i, 'height', '100%');
00079         elem_css($i, 'position', 'absolute');
00080         elem_css($i, 'width', '100%');
00081         // url
00082         if (!empty($obj['iframe-url'])) {
00083                 elem_attr($i, 'src', $obj['iframe-url']);
00084         } else {
00085                 elem_attr($i, 'src', '');
00086         }
00087         // scrolling
00088         if (isset($obj['iframe-scroll']) && $obj['iframe-scroll'] == 'scroll') {
00089                 elem_css($i, 'overflow', 'auto');
00090                 // attribute scrolling is not available in html5 but this effectivly 
00091                 // removes the scrollbars on Chrome, so..
00092                 elem_attr($i, 'scrolling', 'auto');
00093         } else {
00094                 elem_css($i, 'overflow', 'hidden');
00095                 elem_attr($i, 'scrolling', 'no');
00096                 elem_attr($i, 'seamless', 'seamless');
00097         }
00098         elem_append($elem, $i);
00099         if ($args['edit']) {
00100                 // add shield as well
00101                 $s = elem('div');
00102                 elem_add_class($s, 'glue-iframe-shield');
00103                 elem_add_class($s, 'glue-ui');
00104                 elem_css($s, 'height', '100%');
00105                 elem_css($s, 'position', 'absolute');
00106                 elem_css($s, 'width', '100%');
00107                 elem_attr($s, 'title', 'visitors will be able to interact with the webpage below');
00108                 elem_append($elem, $s);
00109         }
00110         
00111         return true;
00112 }
00113 
00114 
00115 function iframe_render_object($args)
00116 {
00117         $obj = $args['obj'];
00118         if (!isset($obj['type']) || $obj['type'] != 'iframe') {
00119                 return false;
00120         }
00121         
00122         $e = elem('div');
00123         elem_attr($e, 'id', $obj['name']);
00124         elem_add_class($e, 'iframe');
00125         elem_add_class($e, 'resizable');
00126         elem_add_class($e, 'object');
00127         
00128         // hooks
00129         invoke_hook_first('alter_render_early', 'iframe', array('obj'=>$obj, 'elem'=>&$e, 'edit'=>$args['edit']));
00130         $html = elem_finalize($e);
00131         invoke_hook_last('alter_render_late', 'iframe', array('obj'=>$obj, 'html'=>&$html, 'elem'=>$e, 'edit'=>$args['edit']));
00132         
00133         return $html;
00134 }
00135

00137 function iframe_render_page_early($args)
00138 {
00139         if ($args['edit']) {
00140                 if (USE_MIN_FILES) {
00141                         html_add_js(base_url().'modules/iframe/iframe-edit.min.js');
00142                 } else {
00143                         html_add_js(base_url().'modules/iframe/iframe-edit.js');
00144                 }
00145                 html_add_css(base_url().'modules/iframe/iframe-edit.css');
00146         }
00147 }

00150 function iframe_save_state($args)
00151 {
00152         $elem = $args['elem'];
00153         $obj = $args['obj'];
00154         if (array_shift(elem_classes($elem)) != 'iframe') {
00155                 return false;
00156         }
00157         
00158         // make sure the type is set
00159         $obj['type'] = 'iframe';
00160         $obj['module'] = 'iframe';
00161         
00162         // hook
00163         invoke_hook('alter_save', array('obj'=>&$obj, 'elem'=>$elem));
00164         
00165         load_modules('glue');
00166         $ret = save_object($obj);
00167         if ($ret['#error']) {
00168                 log_msg('error', 'iframe_save_state: save_object returned '.quot($ret['#data']));
00169                 return false;
00170         } else {
00171                 return true;
00172         }
00173 }
